Maximum usage ratio, based on
cluster:node_cpu:ratio

panels.description:

cluster:memory_usage:ratio

targets.query: uuid.keyword: $uuid AND metricName.keyword: podLatencyQuantilesMeasurement AND quantileName.keyword: Ready

list.definition: {"find": "terms", "field": "jobConfig.name.keyword", "query": "platform.keyword: $platform AND sdnType.keyword: $sdn AND clusterType.keyword: $clusterType AND NOT jobConfig.name: garbage-collection"}
list.label: Job
list.name: job
list.query: {"find": "terms", "field": "jobConfig.name.keyword", "query": "platform.keyword: $platform AND sdnType.keyword: $sdn AND clusterType.keyword: $clusterType AND NOT jobConfig.name: garbage-collection"}

list.definition: {"find": "terms", "field": "workerNodesCount", "query": "platform.keyword: $platform AND sdnType.keyword: $sdn AND jobConfig.name.keyword: $job AND clusterType.keyword: $clusterType"}
list.label: Workers
list.name: workerNodesCount
list.query: {"find": "terms", "field": "workerNodesCount", "query": "platform.keyword: $platform AND sdnType.keyword: $sdn AND jobConfig.name.keyword: $job AND clusterType.keyword: $clusterType"}

list.definition: {"find": "terms", "field": "ocpMajorVersion.keyword", "query": "platform.keyword: $platform AND sdnType.keyword: $sdn AND jobConfig.name.keyword: $job AND workerNodesCount: $workerNodesCount AND clusterType.keyword: $clusterType"}
list.label: OCP Major
list.name: ocpMajorVersion
list.query: {"find": "terms", "field": "ocpMajorVersion.keyword", "query": "platform.keyword: $platform AND sdnType.keyword: $sdn AND jobConfig.name.keyword: $job AND workerNodesCount: $workerNodesCount AND clusterType.keyword: $clusterType"}

list.definition: {"find": "terms", "field": "uuid.keyword", "query": "platform.keyword: $platform AND sdnType.keyword: $sdn AND jobConfig.name.keyword: $job AND workerNodesCount: $workerNodesCount  AND ocpMajorVersion.keyword: $ocpMajorVersion AND clusterType.keyword: $clusterType"}
list.label: UUID
list.name: uuid
list.query: {"find": "terms", "field": "uuid.keyword", "query": "platform.keyword: $platform AND sdnType.keyword: $sdn AND jobConfig.name.keyword: $job AND workerNodesCount: $workerNodesCount  AND ocpMajorVersion.keyword: $ocpMajorVersion AND clusterType.keyword: $clusterType"}

list.description: This filter will be applied to the selected UUIDs
list.name: Filter
